# Not so Covenant Code of Conduct

I'm not your dad nor am I your Government.

I will not enforce anything on you. This is software. Use it, enjoy it. If you don't like it, fork it or don't use it.

This software is not a political or ideological tool.

It is free for anyone to use, no matter your politics, economic status, ideological stance, gender, sexuality, or race.

If you'd like to contribute, feel free to submit pull requests. I'll review them based on technical merit, but no promises on acceptance.

Report issues or suggestions via the project's issue tracker. I'll address them as time allows, but this isn't a support hotline.

This software is released under the MIT License, so you're free to modify, distribute, or build upon it as per the license terms.

Use this software at your own risk. No warranties are provided, and I'm not liable for any damages.
